jd: From: Princy Jain, Maintec princy@maintec.com Reply to: princy@maintec.com Job Title: Sr. Product Manager Location: San Francisco, CADuration: 12 MonthsWorkplace Type: On-site (Mon-Thurs, Friday remote)Job DescriptionResponsibilitiesCollaborate closely with Brand and Technology partners to develop and execute against the site search roadmap.Serve as a liaison between Business and Technology teams to ensure digital solutions meet expectations and provide customer value.Craft business requirements and user stories.Support cross-functional teams by answering questions, making recommendations, providing training, and guiding user acceptance testing.Assist in constantly improving the Digital Product Management team.Perform other duties as required. Requirements5+ years of core product management experience (working with business stakeholders, gathering requirements, writing user stories, working with development teams)Experience with recommendation systems or recommendation engines and/or marketing technology projects (analytics implementation, driving promotion engines, conversion rate optimization (CRO) or testing optimization, landing page optimization)Strong stakeholder management with Brand partners & engineering teams, etc.Motivated to learn, high energy level, etcYou have good communication skills and an ability to influence others.You have a point-of-view about how technology teams should engage to iteratively deliver value for the customer (ideally with Agile methodologies).Quality is important to you and that is evident in all that you do. Top Skills DetailsProduct ManagementSite Search & Recommendations RoadmapSoftware Applications Experience
